honors_and_awards.title: Startup Sharjah Winner: 3rd Place
honors_and_awards.description: Won 3rd place at the Sheraa Startup Sharjah event by presenting an innovative solution that upskills older people who have lost their jobs by being unable to adapt to the transition of the use of digital technology.

honors_and_awards.title: Award for the Most Socially Impactful Startup
honors_and_awards.description: Won the award for the "Most Socially Impactful" startup idea by pitching a platform that offers youth in the UAE access to part-time jobs.
